metadata.title: CVE-2023-7042 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability was found inath10k_wmi_tlv_op_pull_mgmt_tx_compl_ev() indrivers/net/wireless/ath/ath10k/wmi-tlv.c in the Linux kernel. This issuecould be exploited to trigger a denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-aws package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gke package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-oracle package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-raspi package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
